message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, we believe it's worth more than what it costs to produce. Considering its value to others and its significance to us, I propose to sell it to you for $140. This price reflects the balance between the cost of production and the perceived value to both parties. I hope this offer aligns with your expectations and allows us to make a mutually beneficial transaction. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're interested in proceeding.
